content:
Can we please deal with 2 extensions questions this week:

  • an extension for must-support on element types in a profile (and providing some guidance about how this works + is rendered)
  • an extension for defining which extensions propagate to a profile in a snapshot. And also deciding which extensions we have defined don't propagate

both these are current operational issues - thanks
2 mustSupport extensions I think - one for ElementDefinition.type.profile and one for ElementDefinition.type.targetProfile. (Might be able to collapse it into one extension with two contexts.)
also there's a request from Vocab for us to get to J#28479 soonish please
I think we should make an agenda for the WGM - so people in different timezones can estimate whether they need to get out of bed....
(yes, there's definitely some self-interest in this)

Well, no ;-) I was hoping we might be able to actually be a bit more specific on the subjects discussed per "quarter". We've not done that before, but e.g. something like "Conformance resources"issues", "REST issues", "search issues", "ImplementationGuide tooling issues" etc.
Actually planning Jira items by day would be incredibly useful, but that's a tall order.
OK. I can add that to Monday's agenda

Here is the agenda for Monday (September 14th)'s FHIR-I call:

  • Extension for must-support on element types in a profile @Grahame Grieve
  • Extension for defining which extensions propagate to a profile in a snapshot @Grahame Grieve
  • WGM Agenda @Ewout Kramer
  • FHIR-28479 @Grahame Grieve
  • FHIR-28342 @Grahame Grieve
  • FHIR-28344 @Grahame Grieve
  • FHIR-28407 @Josh Mandel

major subjects for the WGM for me:

  • CapabilityStatement rework
  • Future of GraphDefinition
  • review the patterns work
What would be the best way to assist you with that during the week, Grahame?
Hah, GraphDefinition .. I'm not signed up for the WGM, but it would be good to see the outcomes on that one.
